name: Stardisc Destroyer
description:
A rogue AI known as "Stardisc" has taken over a mainframe... you are it's Destroyer, a highly trained digital freedom fighter, sent in to end the corruption embedded deeply in a binary realm.

Clear out the rogue AI and as many of their infectious viruses with your powerful resource disc as possible on the way in, and win it back for all future generations on the way out.

You are the Stardisc Destroyer!

USE \ (BACKSLASH) to change between KB/M and controller, OR use toggle on main menu.

CONTROLS (KB/M):

WASD/ARROWKEYS - Move

SHIFT - Boost

Mouse - Aim

Left/Right Click - Toss/Retrieve Disc

ESC - Exit Game

9/0 - Volume UP/DOWN

-/= - Mute/Return to default audio level.

Mouse Scroll - Zoom Camera

 CONTROLS (CONTROLLER):

Left Stick - Move

LB/B (On Xbox) - Boost

Right Stick - Aim

RT (or RB)/LT (or X or L3) - Toss/Retrieve Disc

D-PAD Right/Left - Volume UP/DOWN

D-PAD Up/Down  - Zoom Camera

This game was created for "My First Game Jam: Winter 2021", and is my first attempt at developing something not text based or assembled in RPG Maker. :)
